titles: Tropologia, or, A key to open Scripture metaphors the first book containing sacred philology, or the tropes in Scripture, reduc'd under their proper heads, with a brief explication of each / partly translated and partly compil'd from the works of the learned by T.D. The second and third books containing a practical improvement (parallel-wise) of several of the most frequent and useful metaphors, allegories, and express similitudes of the Old and New Testament / by B.K.
author: De Laune, Thomas, d. 1685.
Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
publisher: Printed by John Richardson and John Darby for Enoch Prosser,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
